entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.14.0
entry.content:
New features, Changes and Fixes

  • New: Health checking and displaying excluded routes (e.g. backend services) on WebUI ("Proxies" and "Metrics" pages)

  • New: #102 idle-sleep dependencies / triggers. Full Docs

It can be set with depends_on in docker compose, or specifying proxy.depends_on label

You don't need to, and should not set idle_timeout on dependencies

  • For depends_on in docker compose, GoDoxy will read the com.docker.compose.depends_on label (which is set by docker compose automatically) from the container.

  • It supports condition, which is optional and can be one of:

    • service_started (default)
    • service_healthy

    It respects to condition in depends_on field from docker compose file, see Docker compose docs for more details, e.g.

    ```yaml

    without conditions (implies service_started)

    depends_on: - redis - postgres

    with conditions

    depends_on: redis: condition: service_healthy postgres: condition: service_started ```

    Or specifying with labels:

    ```yaml labels: proxy.depends_on: redis:service_healthy,postgres:service_started

    yaml style

    labels: proxy.depends_on: | - redis:service_healthy - postgres:service_started ```

  • Fix: container wake time out before the actual time out value set with proxy.wake_timeout

  • Misc: overall improvements in idle-sleep implementation
  • Misc: parallelizing routes loading

Full idle-sleep example snippet

```yaml services: app: image: example/app labels: proxy.idle_timeout: 1h30s depends_on: redis: condition: service_healthy postgres: condition: service_started

redis: image: redis:alpine healthcheck: test: ["CMD", "redis-cli", "ping"] interval: 10s timeout: 5s retries: 5

postgres: image: postgres:alpine volumes: - ./pg_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data environment: POSTGRES_DB: ${POSTGRES_DB} POSTGRES_USER: ${POSTGRES_USER} POSTGRES_PASSWORD: ${POSTGRES_PASSWORD} POSTGRES_PORT: ${POSTGRES_PORT} ```

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.14.1
entry.content:
Changes

  • WebUI: show stopped containers as stopped instead of unknown in "Proxies" page
  • WebUI: correctly show idle-sleep dependencies as napping instead of unhealthy or unknown
  • WebUI: Metrics -> Uptime: fix search box not being shown on first load
  • GoDoxy: fix race condition when load-balancers initialize
  • Wiki: rephrase and clarify idle-sleep and health checking documentation

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.14.2
entry.content:
Changes / Fixes

  • Routes: Incorrect URL for load balanced routes
  • Routes: remove x- routes on load to prevent from validation and showing up on home page
  • Metrics: fixed occasional divided by zero error on network speed / disk speed calculation
  • Security: updated go from 1.24.3 to 1.24.4

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.15.0
entry.content:
New

  • Idle-sleep: Support TCP/UDP routes (e.g. game servers). Tested with minecraft and palworld servers
  • Specify docker network via proxy.network label, e.g.

yaml services: app: image: nginx:latest labels: proxy.network: vpn networks: - vpn - local networks: vpn: external: true local: external: true

  • Specify agent for routes from route files, e.g.

yaml # app -> Oracle VPS's localhost:8080 app: port: 8080 agent: Oracle

Changes

  • Notification: Improve retry logic with exponential backoff
  • WebUI Login page: auto focus on username field
  • WebUI Proxies page
  • Long text in "Details" column is now collapsible
  • Moved "Provider" column to the left

Fixes

  • Docker: Wilcard labels proxy.* not working in some cases
  • Routes:
  • Fix routes with x- prefix being loaded and displayed
  • Fix TCP/UDP routes with a complete rewrite
  • Misc: edge cases that crashes with "call of reflect.Value.IsNil on string Value" when validating config files

entry.title: New release for GoDoxy: v0.15.1
